name: Honoo no Toukyuuji: Dodge Danpei
overview: Danpei Ichigeki is a practiced elementary school dodgeball player for the Tamagawa Team, who are about to challenge seven other dodgeball teams in the upcoming tournament. The dodgeball mechanics consist of moving a selected player around the field and making a charged ball throw, followed by dynamic cutscenes that require the opposing player to move and interact during a ball launch, while the cutscene is playing. The game can be played in story mode, in which the player does an adventure driven game in control of Danpei or in versus mode, in which the player can be any one of the eight teams.
